title: FS: T206 Raw Lot of 20 - Joss, King - SOLD!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Raw Lot of 20 - Joss, King - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
LOT IS SOLD
Cards have flaws visible in scans, but most should grade at SGC30

See all scans here (there is a link on each page to download the image which shows larger scans):
[url]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers#100105[/url]
